root.name: Wits and Wagers
root.description: OverviewWits and Wagers is an updated version of a classic board game of trivial domination. In the game,which supports up to six people,Â players answer trivia questions throughout seven rounds. The game has 700 questions and the game supports an integrated system so that you will not get a question twice in a small time period. Wits and Wagers supports use of the Xbox Live Vision camera for both online and offline matches, it replaces your characters head with that of your camera. The game is best played with friends and family, and is priced well at 800 Microsoft Points.
